title: Decorated To Death
description: The arrival of obnoxious TV decorating star Hezekia "Zeke" Harwood in the peaceful Bedforshire village of Snupperton Mumsley at the invitation of Lady Prunella Bliterington leads to disaster when Harwood turns up dead and Simon Kirby-Jones must investigate to clear Lady Prunella's name. Reprint.
author: Dean A. James
